text: Phwk khea ca tham cea keiyw kab deuxn txng ham sung kar su rb nı deuxn nan cng klaw theid wa kar su rb nı deuxn nan pen sing hıy to læa kar khadkhwang hı xxk cak thang khx ngxallxhˌ læa kar ptiseth kar sraththa tx phraxngkh læa kar kidkan xal-masyidi l ha rxm tlxd cn kar khab li cha wxal-masyidi l ha rxm xxk pi nan pen sing hıy to ying kwa n thi xallxhˌ læa kar fit nahˌ nan hıy to ying kwa kar kha læa phwk khea ca yang khng txsu phwk cea tx pi cnkwa phwk khea ca thahı phwk cea klab xxk pi cak sasna khxng phwk cea hak phwk khea samarth læa phu dı nı hmu phwk cea klab xxk pi cak sasna khxng khea læw khea tay lng khna thi khea pen phu ptiseth sraththa læw sir chn hela ni hæla brrda kar ngan khxng phwk khea ri phl thang nı lok ni læa prlok læa chn hela ni hæla khux chaw nrk sung phwk khea ca xyu nı nrk nan tlxd kal
